meta.title: Multiplayer Player Stats - Company of Heroes 3
meta.description:
Overall information about all Multiplayer players in Company of Heroes 3.
Currently tracking {{count, number}} Multiplayer players.
meta.keywords: coh3 players stats, player stats, player countries, coh3 players history

players.title: PC Players Stats
players.totalTrackedPlayersTooltip: We can only track players who have been Multiplayer at least once in any game mode since May 19th, 2023.
players.multiplayerPlayersLast30Days: Multiplayer players in the last 30 days
players.multiplayerPlayersLast7Days: Multiplayer players in the last 7 days
players.multiplayerPlayersLast24Hours: Multiplayer players in the last 24 hours
players.xboxPsNote: We do not track XBOX and PS players here.
